title: An Evening at the Depot
description: Pre-Return to Riverside Rally! An Evening of Space Age Country Music, Riverside Tales, Noshing & Nightcaps, featuring NickyBob Shoulders & his Cosmic One Man Band.
image_alt: Poster for An Evening at the Depot

title: Lager with Loggers
description: An evening event featuring music, food, drink, and local historians. Hosted by the Potlatch Historical Society in the Freight Room at the WI&M Depot, with help from the U of Idaho Dept of English, the Idaho Humanities Council and The Latah County Community Foundation.
image_alt: Poster for lager with loggers by Karen Rohn
